name: Cappuccino
description: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Austria with later development taking place in Italy.

name: Latte
description: Late is a coffee drink of Italian origin made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Flat white
description: A flat white is a coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles and a glossy or velvety consistency).
